kese wuwada eya sankirna rugatha kirimak wiya.rajina selwanayagam samaga age kalayathanaye ranganaya hadarana ude pipunu mal wani sundara shishyawan wissak pamana sitiyoya.owun dutuwita rajina mona tharam praweshamakin teliye natumata shishyawan thora thibunidayi mata sithuni.siyalu denagema pahe demawpiyanda pamina siti bawin owun samaga sathutu samichiye yedennata apata awasthawak nowiya.degodahari wayasata pamina sitiyada rajina age shishyawantath wada piyakaru yayi winod ma samaga kiwe aya dutu pamaninmaya.mamada eya ekahela anumatha kalemi.

ekawarama diyaniya gage gasa gena gos athi athara aya bera ganimata mawa diyata pana athi bawath pasuwa awurudu 10 k wayasathi putha owun bera ganimata diyata pana athi bawath polisiya pawasayi.diye gasa gena giya thidena sewime katayuthu me wana witath sidu karana bawa peradeniya polisiya sandahan kaleya.
aththatama eya rachanaya kara athi ridmaya apata rangapamata itha pahasuwi thibenawa.

mehema thanu nirmana karuwek gana, me gi wala thanu uthpaththiya gana mamanam me ahuwamayi.me namawath mechcharakal mage aha gatila thibune na.api nodanna me wage hanguna manik kata me rate thawa kochcharanam athida, nasu githa ketharamnam athida.

yam me thewana mahanabamuno ‘api me maraya wisin wapula me niwapaya wu lokamisayan asuru kota aashayasthanayak karannemu nam, ehi aashayasthanayak kota maraya wisin wapula me niwapaya wu me lokamisayanta no wada musapath nowi panychakama bhojana anubhawa karannemu nam, no wada musapath no wi panychakama bhojana anubhawa karannamo math no wannemu nam, math no wuwamo sihi nathi no paminennemu nam, sihi nathi bawata no paminiyamo me marayage niwapaya wu me panychakama gunayehi maraya wisin kamathi se kata yuththamo no wannemu nam yeheka’yi mese sithuwahu da, ohu maraya wapula me lokamisayan asuru kota aashayasthanayak kalaha.
